description.zh-cn: 中国警卫工作者，曾任中共中央办公厅警卫局副局长、公安部八局局长，以及第五、六届全国政协委员。
description.en: A Chinese security professional who served as the Deputy Director of the Security Bureau of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, Director of the Eighth Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security, and a member of the 5th and 6th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.en: Li Shuhuai was from Zizhou, Shaanxi.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“中国共产党党员”，李树槐是中国共产党的成员。
description.en: According to the page category 'Members of the Communist Party of China', Li Shuhuai is a member of the Communist Party of China.
